statements: SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_date, product_name, quality_rating FROM audits;
SELECT auditor_name, product_name FROM audits WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT audit_id, product_name, quality_rating FROM audits ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE product_name = 'Product X' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditor_name, quality_rating FROM audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND quality_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM audits GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_audits DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT auditor_name FROM audits WHERE quality_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM audits ORDER BY quality_rating DESC, audit_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name, audit_result FROM audits WHERE audit_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM findings;
SELECT finding_id, finding_description, severity_level FROM findings WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_result = TRUE;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT finding_description, severity_level FROM findings ORDER BY severity_level DESC;
SELECT audit_id, COUNT(finding_id) AS total_findings FROM findings GROUP BY audit_id HAVING total_findings > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND audit_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Pass';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_status FROM audit_items WHERE audit_id = 2;
SELECT score_id, score_value FROM audit_scores ORDER BY score_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT item_description, item_status FROM audit_items WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(score_value) FROM audit_scores;
SELECT audit_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM audit_items GROUP BY audit_id HAVING total_items > 2;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT auditor_name, conducted_date FROM audits WHERE result='Pass';
SELECT name, role FROM auditors ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT description FROM standards WHERE department='HR';
SELECT audit_id, result FROM audit_results WHERE auditor_id=101;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT auditor_name, conducted_date FROM audits ORDER BY conducted_date DESC;
SELECT audits.auditor_name, auditors.role FROM audits JOIN audit_results ON audits.audit_id = audit_results.audit_id JOIN auditors ON audit_results.auditor_id = auditors.auditor_id;

SELECT auditors.name, standards.description AS standard_description FROM auditors LEFT JOIN audit_results ON auditors.auditor_id = audit_results.auditor_id LEFT JOIN standards ON audit_results.standard_id = standards.standard_id;
SELECT MAX(conducted_date) AS latest_audit_date FROM audits;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Passed';
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT finding_description, corrective_action FROM findings WHERE finding_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM audits WHERE audit_result='Passed';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE department_id=1 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT audits.audit_id, audits.audit_date, audits.auditor_name, findings.finding_description FROM audits INNER JOIN findings ON audits.audit_id = findings.audit_id;

SELECT employees.employee_name, departments.department_name, corrective_actions.action_description FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id LEFT JOIN corrective_actions ON employees.employee_id = corrective_actions.finding_id WHERE corrective_actions.action_status='Pending';
